SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.sandag.popsyn
Class Version

java.lang.Object
  org.sandag.popsyn.Version

public class Version
extends java.lang.Object

This is primarily a metadata class containing parameters for each run of PopSyn II. This class also maintains persistent information on runtime and identifiers.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Daniels, Clint

Field Summary
private  int acsYear
          The ACS year.
private  GeographyType allocationGeography
          The geography type that HHs/GQs are allocated to (typically MGRA)
private  boolean balanceAllPumaSamples
          An option that increases the sample of hh/gq used for balancing in each TAZ to include all hh/gq in the corresponding PUMA
private  GeographyType balanceGeography
          The geographic level at which balancing occurs (typically TAZ)
private  double balanceSelectionFactor
          The balance selection factor is multiplied by the zonal household or GQ total to yield the total number of HHs and GQs to be selected for balancing
private  java.lang.String contact
          The username of the computer that is running PopSyn
private  double convergenceCriteria
          The maximum difference between the control value and balancer value at which a variable is considered converged.
private  java.lang.String description
           
private  java.util.Date endTime
          The end time for this PopSyn run
private  boolean fixRandomSeed
          This boolean indicates whether random seeds are fixed to force the random numbers generated to be the same in each run
private  ControlCategoryType gqAlAtt
          The target category to use when allocating GQs from TAZ to MGRA
private  ControlCategoryType hhAlAtt
          The target category to use when allocating HHs from TAZ to MGRA
private  java.lang.Integer id
          Unique identifier for the PopSyn run.
private  int maxLoop
          The maximum number of loops to make in the balancer if the households do not converge.
private  int numExtTaz
          Number of external zones (TAZs)
private  int numPumas
          The total number of PUMAs
private  int numValidationMetrics
          The number of validation metrics to use
private  int pumaStart
          Represents the lowest PUMA ID
private  GeographyType pumsGeography
          The geography type that PUMS records are available for (typically PUMA)
private  long randomSeed
          The fixed seed given to the Random object when it is instantiated
private  java.lang.String regenerateTargets
          Determines whether to regenerate ACS targets.
private  java.lang.String selectZones
          Determines whether all zones are balanced or whether only specified zones are balanced.
private  double smallValue
           
private  int sourceId
          The PUMS data source to use (Census, ACS)

          The start time for this PopSyn run

          The geography type that targets are available for (typically TAZ)
private  int targetMajorVersion
           
private  java.lang.String targetMethod
          Determines whether target generation method is set to "standard" or "growth factor"
private  int targetMinorVersion
           
private  int targetYear
          The year that the targets pertain to
private  boolean useInitWeight
          A boolean that determines whether Household objects start with their initial PUMS weights.
private  int valCount
          The number of validation metrics to use
private  GeographyType validationGeography
          The geographic level at which validation occurs (typically TAZ)
private  java.lang.String workDir
          The directory to write output CSV files to

Field Detail

id

private java.lang.Integer id
Unique identifier for the PopSyn run. This value should only be assigned by the database.

maxLoop

private int maxLoop
The maximum number of loops to make in the balancer if the households do not converge. The larger the number, the fewer non-converged zones there will be, but run-times will be longer.

convergenceCriteria

private double convergenceCriteria
The maximum difference between the control value and balancer value at which a variable is considered converged. The greater the value, the fewer non-converged zones there will be, but run times will be longer.

smallValue

private double smallValue

targetMajorVersion

private int targetMajorVersion

targetMinorVersion

private int targetMinorVersion

description

private java.lang.String description

targetYear

private int targetYear
The year that the targets pertain to

sourceId

private int sourceId
The PUMS data source to use (Census, ACS)

targetGeography

private GeographyType targetGeography
The geography type that targets are available for (typically TAZ)

allocationGeography

private GeographyType allocationGeography
The geography type that HHs/GQs are allocated to (typically MGRA)

balanceGeography

private GeographyType balanceGeography
The geographic level at which balancing occurs (typically TAZ)

pumsGeography

private GeographyType pumsGeography
The geography type that PUMS records are available for (typically PUMA)

validationGeography

private GeographyType validationGeography
The geographic level at which validation occurs (typically TAZ)

startTime

private java.util.Date startTime
The start time for this PopSyn run

endTime

private java.util.Date endTime
The end time for this PopSyn run

contact

private java.lang.String contact
The username of the computer that is running PopSyn

numExtTaz

private int numExtTaz
Number of external zones (TAZs)

pumaStart

private int pumaStart
Represents the lowest PUMA ID

numPumas

private int numPumas
The total number of PUMAs

numValidationMetrics

private int numValidationMetrics
The number of validation metrics to use

randomSeed

private long randomSeed
The fixed seed given to the Random object when it is instantiated

workDir

private java.lang.String workDir
The directory to write output CSV files to

valCount

private int valCount
The number of validation metrics to use

gqAlAtt

private ControlCategoryType gqAlAtt
The target category to use when allocating GQs from TAZ to MGRA

hhAlAtt

private ControlCategoryType hhAlAtt
The target category to use when allocating HHs from TAZ to MGRA

balanceSelectionFactor

private double balanceSelectionFactor
The balance selection factor is multiplied by the zonal household or GQ total to yield the total number of HHs and GQs to be selected for balancing

useInitWeight

private boolean useInitWeight
A boolean that determines whether Household objects start with their initial PUMS weights. If false, all weights are set to 1 instead of using initial PUMS weights.

balanceAllPumaSamples

private boolean balanceAllPumaSamples
An option that increases the sample of hh/gq used for balancing in each TAZ to include all hh/gq in the corresponding PUMA

fixRandomSeed

private boolean fixRandomSeed
This boolean indicates whether random seeds are fixed to force the random numbers generated to be the same in each run

acsYear

private int acsYear
The ACS year. When the acsYear property is set to 0, PUMS households from all ACS years can be used.

targetMethod

private java.lang.String targetMethod
Determines whether target generation method is set to "standard" or "growth factor"

regenerateTargets

private java.lang.String regenerateTargets
Determines whether to regenerate ACS targets. When set to "true", targets are regenerated before balancing.

selectZones

private java.lang.String selectZones
Determines whether all zones are balanced or whether only specified zones are balanced. When set to "NA", all zones are balanced. When set to zone numbers, only the specified zones are balanced.

isUseInitWeight

public boolean isUseInitWeight()
Determines whether Household objects start with their initial PUMS weights

Returns:
returns a boolean where true indicates that Household objects start with their initial weights (rather than 1)

isBalanceAllPumaSamples

public boolean isBalanceAllPumaSamples()
Determines whether PopSyn is increasing the sample of hh/gq used for balancing in each TAZ to include all hh/gq in the corresponding PUMA

Returns:
returns a boolean indicating whether all hh/gq in the PUMA are selected for balancing

setBalanceAllPumaSamples

public void setBalanceAllPumaSamples(boolean balanceAllPumaSamples)

Parameters:
balanceAllPumaSamples - a boolean indicating whether all hh/gq in the PUMA are selected for balancing

isFixRandomSeed

public boolean isFixRandomSeed()

returns a boolean indicating whether random seeds are fixed

fixRandomSeed - a boolean indicating whether random seeds are fixed

Returns:
a String that triggers target regeneration when it equals "true"

getSelectZones

public java.lang.String getSelectZones()
Gets the zones selected for balancing, if applicable

Returns:
returns a string listing zones selected for balancing. Returns 'NA' if all zones will be balanced

setSelectZones

public void setSelectZones(java.lang.String selectZones)
Sets the zones to select for balancing

Parameters:
selectZones - a string listing zones selected for balancing, or 'NA' if all zones should be balanced
